works.description:
It appears that the website scambook.com has taken copyrighted copies of the front page of our website and used it as there own images without either out knowledge or approval. Plain and simply I wish to be deleted from Google ASAP please..!!

This seems to be a standard practice of scambook.com and it also appears that they have hundreds if not thousands of other copyright violations taken from website and I would suggest that Google further investigates this matter.

One could say that this is at what one could consider of epidemic proportions..!!
